modName: Ahzidal Dukaan Zahkriisos As Heavy And Cloth Circlets
summary: Elemental dragon priests on Solstheim also drop circlet versions of their masks. Heavy version for your stylish heavy armor Dragonborn, and mage version for your mage Dragonborn. Choose your option, you cannot get both. Update-craftable option.
descriptionHtml:
Elemental dragon priests on Solstheim also drop circlet versions of their masks.

Heavy versions work exactly like their masks (they still drop them too) but enable your character to look pretty without those masks obscuring the Dragonborn's beauty.

Mage versions are regular circlets with appropriate elemental enchantment, you can benefit from those masks but still have your mage looking pretty and not breaking mage armor perks :)

If you think that getting both the masks and circlets is too much you can drop the masks in a river or dont use them. I might make a new version where you craft circlets from the masks if people really have an issue with getting both masks and circlets. Motivation for this mod came from the fact that dragon priest masks obscure your face so you cant look pretty any more, and they dont work well with mages who would benefit the most from them.

Update-Circlets are now craftable, you will need the mask, gold and ruby circlet and filled grand soul gem to craft these heavy or cloth circlets.

Requirements:

Skyrim 1.9
Dragonborn

Installation:

Choose your option.

Drop SolstheimPriestCirclets.esp to your Skyrim/Data folder.

Uninstallation:

Delete SolstheimPriestCirclets.esp
author: Darth Sidious
